briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Oral Ibrexafungerp (SCY-078) vs. Placebo in Subjects With Acute Vulvovaginal Candidiasis (VANISH 303)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

Subject is a postmenarchal female subject 12 years and older

Subject has a diagnosis of symptomatic AVVC at baseline including a positive microscopic examination with 10% KOH in a vaginal sample revealing yeast forms (hyphae/pseudohyphae) or budding yeasts, and vaginal pH (â‰¤4.5)

Exclusion Criteria:

Subject has any vaginal condition other than AVVC that may interfere with the diagnosis or evaluation of response to therapy, such as suspected or confirmed concurrent causes of vulvovaginitis and/or cervicitis (mixed infection)

Need for systemic and/or topical (vaginal) antifungal treatment, including prescription or over-the-counter products during the study and treatment for VVC 28 days prior to randomization

Subject is actively menstruating at the time of the Baseline visit.

Subject has uncontrolled diabetes mellitus.

Subject has a vaginal sample with pH \>4.5.

Subject has a history of or an active cervical/vaginal cancer.

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Cure (Complete Resolution of Signs and Symptoms)
outcomeMeasures.description: measured by the percentage of subjects with clinical cure (complete resolution of signs and symptoms) at the test-of-cure (TOC) visit

outcomeMeasures.title: Mycological Eradication (Negative Culture for Growth of Yeast)
outcomeMeasures.description: percentage of subjects with mycological eradication (negative culture for growth of Candida species) at the TOC visit

outcomeMeasures.title: Clinical Cure and Mycological Eradication (Responder Outcome)
outcomeMeasures.description: percentage of subjects with clinical cure and mycological eradication (responder outcome) at the TOC visit

outcomeMeasures.title: Complete Clinical Response at Follow-Up
outcomeMeasures.description: percentage of subjects with complete resolution of signs and symptoms at the Follow-up (FU) visit

outcomeMeasures.title: Overall Treatment-Emergent Adverse Events (Safety Set)
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of subjects with treatment related adverse events
